name: 校园春日
description:
Start is just a waste, school bullies, bullying, receive protection money, a little disobedient was kicked to explode the second.
The main character, junkie xiang, is a sophomore at a private, gang-ridden high school.
In such a school, the nature of the cowardly he became the school ruffians bullied objects.Being bullied, being paid for protection are all part of the routine.
The plot is rich, high degree of freedom, a variety of branch options can trigger different endings with the plot.
In this world, you can endure all kinds of bullies and bullies until you graduate from middle school.It's up to the player to choose.Start your campus life now!
Start your campus life now!Start your campus life now!
